analysis.description:
DisbursableToken.claimable (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#284-290) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- DisbursableToken.accounts

MainSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#435-444) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(recipient,tokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#441)

MainSale.authorizedCreateTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#476-481) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(recipient,tokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#481)

MainSale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#535-540) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#535-537)

MainSale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-foreignToken.transfer(multisigVault,foreignToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol)

DisbursableToken.pointMultiplier should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x469cac3cae51d3fb5ad2699f9e2494feb44d5662.sol#255-256)
